contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Guide to Repository pattern with a Generic type in Xperience by Kentico
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Kentico community member, Milan Lund, dives into the technical deep end and explains his preferred way to use the Repository pattern in C# for Xperience by Kentico solutions. If you're exploring techniques for content retrieval in Xperience solutions, definitely give this a read!
